entities.name: mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is a teacher at Hogwarts. She shouts orders to Filch and casts the Piertotum Locomotor spell.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is a caretaker at Hogwarts. He is ordered by McGonagall to fetch Peeves, but seems unsure of who Peeves is.

entities.name: peeves
entities.description: Peeves is a mischievous ghost at Hogwarts. Filch has been complaining about him for a quarter of a century, but seems unsure of who he is.

entities.name: piertotum locomotor
entities.description: Piertotum Locomotor is a spell cast by McGonagall to summon the statues and suits of armor in the castle.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is the school where McGonagall, Filch, Peeves, and Harry are located. It is threatened by an unknown danger.

relationships.description: McGonagall orders Filch to fetch Peeves, indicating a hierarchical relationship between the two.
McGonagall casts the Piertotum Locomotor spell to summon Peeves, indicating a relationship of control or authority.
McGonagall shouts orders to protect Hogwarts, indicating a relationship of responsibility or guardianship.
